name: Ken Follett's The Pillars of the Earth

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

execute.description: Installing game, it will take a while...

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  args: --some-arg
  exe: $GAMEDIR/game.sh
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- chmodx: installer
- execute:
    args: -- --i-agree-to-all-licenses --noreadme --nooptions --noprompt --destination=$GAMEDIR
    description: Installing game, it will take a while...
    file: installer
system:
  terminal: true
